General Certificate” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:25px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:30px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1527874203586{padding-top: 28px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Course……………………………………………………………….$1250.00
This course gives you a strong grasp on personality through handwriting analysis and enables you to prepare profile analyses.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:18px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:32px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”yes” top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”2. Diploma” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:25px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:30px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1527874902149{padding-top: 28px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Course……………………………………………………………………………..$3500.00
This course is an in-depth study of holistic handwriting analysis. Correspondence students work independently at their own speed and pay as they go.
Monthly payments of $350.00
Full payment in advance: $3300.00″ font_container=”tag:p|font_size:18px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:32px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1623785056027{padding-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Personal payments are available for all courses.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:20px|text_align:center|color:%232d2d2d” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1527286695861{margin-top: -30px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column animation=”fade-in”][vc_separator color=”black” css=”.vc_custom_1527697655574{padding-top: 10px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”yes” top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1527697622741{margin-bottom: -50px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” background_color=”#7a9431″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”CAREER OPPORTUNITIES FOR GRADUATES:” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:25px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Graduates are able to prepare personnel selection analyses for corporations, teach introductory courses, complete personality analyses for individuals and assist guidance counselors in the area of career suitability.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
